I'm trying to get started with JUnit 4.1. After installing JUnit, I 
typed =
the recommended command: 

"java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests=
.AllTests"

The instructions say that this should result in an "OK" message=
. I'm 
getting this result: 

FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 261,  Failures: 2

I'm=

Java is running on Windows XP,
java =
version "1.5.0_07"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build =
1.5.0_07-b03)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_07-b03, mixed mode, s=
haring)

What am I overlooking?

RK Henry
